form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Title of the image: 'May 2 20, 1987' Form number: 'Emilie Peguuro'

full_text: May 20, 1987 To whom it may concern: This is to inform and certify to you that I, Emilie Peguero residing at 104-08 211 Street, Queens Village N. Y. 11429, provide lodging to Reverend Edgard Delouis. I am a member of the Haitian community who supports the Reverend. I am willing to continue to provide this service as long as it is necessary. Sincerely, Emilie Peguero
